content: ssk enjoy 30 34 38 42 stitches round 2 k round 3 k10 12 14 16 ssk x2 k2 k2tog x 2 k10 12 14 16 26 30 34 38 stitches round 4 k8 cast of to last 8 sts k8 thank you for purchasing this pattern if you have any questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me at wanderingcatstudio@hotmail com fine knitting fibres for this pattern can be purchased at wanderingcatyarns etsy com copyright statement pattern designed by valerie johnson wandering cat studio 2009 user may not copy and/or distribute pattern for profit or otherwise
